contentrichtext.text: == Summary == {{Non-free use rationale album cover| Article = The Velvet Underground & Nico | Use = Infobox <!-- ADDITIONAL INFORMATION --> | Name = The Velvet Underground & Nico | Artist = [[The Velvet Underground]] and [[Nico]] | Label = [[Verve Records|Verve]]/[[Polygram Records]] | Graphic Artist = [[Andy Warhol]] | Item = | Type = album | Website = | Owner = | Commentary = <!--OVERRIDE FIELDS --> | Description = | Source = | Portion = | Low_resolution = | Purpose = <!--Must be specified if Use is not Infobox / Header / Section / Artist--> | Replaceability = | other_information = }} Cover art for [[The Velvet Underground]]'s 1967 debut album ''[[The Velvet Underground & Nico|The Velvet Underground and Nico]]''. Image by [[Andy Warhol]], copyright held by [[Polygram Records]]. == Licensing == {{Non-free album cover|image has rationale=yes}}==Rationale of fair use for [[The Velvet Underground & Nico|The Velvet Underground and Nico]]== #No free or public domain images have been located for this album. #The image is of lower resolution than the original cover. #The image does not limit the copyright owners' rights to distribute the album in any way. #For an article about an album, the cover artwork provides essential information. #This image is used on various websites, so its use on Wikipedia does not make it significantly more accessible than it already is. #The cover is being used for informational purposes only.
